channel.title: Login problem
channel.description:
Well I have portforward ahead of time and I used no-ip.org to log into my server. My server base, allowed me to login before... Currently it will disconnect you and in the runserver this is the error:
[code]Loading... done Server Information: PORT: 43594 MAXPLAYERS: 1000 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:5595) at client.run(client.java:15450) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected ()[/code]

item.title: Login problem
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Well That happened with all the devolution bases that I have tried. Also the server tends to work only when I use local host(127.0.0.1) So idk if I may have messed up during portforwarding or my router cannot support the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Login problem
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

if you added something, delete it and re-try? If not the servers messed up, try a different base.

Read full topic
